snippet.title: Spine Gun Fu Trailer – PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
Spine is sci-fi themed, graffiti-stained action game in which you play a female street artist called Redline who goes full John Wick after her brother is kidnapped. It already displays an impeccable sense of style, and if the combat plays as good as it looks, developer Nekki could well be on to a winner. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731290/SPINE__This_is_Gun_Fu/

https://www.pcgamer.com

X: https://x.com/pcgamer

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#pcgamer #pcgaming #PCGSMW #spine
